uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list

Interface MediaListPlayerEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioMediaListPlayerComponent, EmbeddedMediaListPlayerComponent, MediaListPlayerEventAdapter

    public interface MediaListPlayerEventListener
    Specification for a component that is interested in receiving event notifications from the media list player.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mediaDurationChanged(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer, long newDuration) 
      void mediaFreed(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer) 
      void mediaMetaChanged(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer, int metaType) 
      void mediaParsedChanged(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer, int newStatus) 
      void mediaStateChanged(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer, int newState) 
      void mediaSubItemAdded(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer, libvlc_media_t subItem) 
      void nextItem(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer, libvlc_media_t item, String itemMrl)
      The media list player started playing the next item in the list.
      void played(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer)
      Place-holder, do not use.
      void stopped(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer)
      The media list player stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • played

        void played(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer)
        Place-holder, do not use. Warning: the native media list player event manager reports that it does not support this event.
        Parameters:
        mediaListPlayer - media list player that raised the event

      • nextItem

        void nextItem(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer,
              libvlc_media_t item,
              String itemMrl)
        The media list player started playing the next item in the list.
        Parameters:
        mediaListPlayer - media list player that raised the event
        item - next item instance
        itemMrl - MRL of the next item

      • stopped

        void stopped(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer)
        The media list player stopped.
        Parameters:
        mediaListPlayer - media list player that raised the event
        Since:
        vlc 2.1.0

      • mediaMetaChanged

        void mediaMetaChanged(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer,
                      int metaType)
        Parameters:
        mediaListPlayer - media list player that raised the event
        metaType - meta data type

      • mediaSubItemAdded

        void mediaSubItemAdded(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer,
                       libvlc_media_t subItem)
        Parameters:
        mediaListPlayer - media list player that raised the event
        subItem - media sub-item instance handle

        Parameters:
